response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it will also bring great value to someone like yourself who appreciates its qualities. Considering its rarity and the effort put into it, I am offering it to you for $750,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth while leaving room for you to enjoy its benefits without undue financial strain. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
